instructions: I shall read to you a number of characteristics that belong to a particular person. Please listen to them carefully and try to form an impression of the kind of person described. You will later be asked to give a brief characterization of the person in just a few sentences.

items.question: From the following pair, select the term that is most in accordance with the view you had formed: generous—ungenerous
From the following pair, select the term that is most in accordance with the view you had formed: shrewd—wise
From the following pair, select the term that is most in accordance with the view you had formed: unhappy—happy
From the following pair, select the term that is most in accordance with the view you had formed: irritable—good-natured
From the following pair, select the term that is most in accordance with the view you had formed: humorous—humorless
From the following pair, select the term that is most in accordance with the view you had formed: sociable—unsociable
From the following pair, select the term that is most in accordance with the view you had formed: popular—unpopular
From the following pair, select the term that is most in accordance with the view you had formed: unreliable—reliable
From the following pair, select the term that is most in accordance with the view you had formed: important—insignificant
From the following pair, select the term that is most in accordance with the view you had formed: ruthless—humane
From the following pair, select the term that is most in accordance with the view you had formed: good-looking—unattractive
From the following pair, select the term that is most in accordance with the view you had formed: persistent—unstable
From the following pair, select the term that is most in accordance with the view you had formed: frivolous—serious
From the following pair, select the term that is most in accordance with the view you had formed: restrained—talkative
From the following pair, select the term that is most in accordance with the view you had formed: self-centered—altruistic
From the following pair, select the term that is most in accordance with the view you had formed: imaginative—hard-headed
From the following pair, select the term that is most in accordance with the view you had formed: strong—weak
From the following pair, select the term that is most in accordance with the view you had formed: dishonest—honest
